meanings.definition: Capable of being refused or rejected.
meanings.sent1: The offer was refusable, so I politely declined.
meanings.sent2: She handed me the refusable gift, but I decided not to take it.
meanings.sent3: The refusable invitation to the boring party made me chuckle.
meanings.sent4: His refusable excuse for being late was as transparent as glass.
meanings.sent5: The refusable job offer seemed like a trap, so I avoided it.

meanings.definition: Able to be declined or turned down.
meanings.sent1: The refusable proposal was not to my liking, so I said no.
meanings.sent2: He presented me with a refusable opportunity, but I chose to pass.
meanings.sent3: The refusable dessert looked tempting, but I resisted the temptation.
meanings.sent4: Her refusable request for a loan left me feeling uneasy.
meanings.sent5: The refusable offer to join the club was tempting, but I had to refuse.
